post.body: wrong ID There is a wonderful woman on Twitter that is trying to save 5,000 jobs.Please contact her if you can help her cause.
I had a fun series of Tweets about follow/not follow with @RayEdward @WillieCrawford They have opposite ideas. I follow back...
are you listing your calls on www.TeleSeminarnation.com ? It can get you some extra exposure, next time.
I see you just posted so hi. I am still up doing a book endorsement for @DaliBurgado and trying to find the email to reply to.
Your BBQ story was touching.I have had them as well, twice. Hard to make decisions.People want the hive -so next time...
The coffee sounded good, but I am going to get my 3.5 hours of beauty sleep once I finish this email. You must be on EST-me PST
I grew up in Southern Ohio and have been in much of Kentucky. It is a beautiful state. Go wake your son up. To bed with me.
Oh by the way I did finish the Testimonial.I hope it was good.Now it is a little to late for that judgement.Sent2 @AnthonyWhyms
You are a webmaster, etc so give my brand new blog a look see. www.TeleSeminarWebFolk.com Suggestions welcome. It is my first.
@AlexMandossian is answering questions 5 hours 18 minutes into the first TeleSeminar Secrets call of the class. Amazing.
I loved the shopping along the River Walk and the Department Store almost on top of the Alamo. My sister lived there long ago.
Enjoyed our tweets last night. Today was spent at two events with @EricLofholm @SuzyPrudden and LA2LAChef. 2 great trainers!
@jeanettejoy I love the Museum of the Pacific War in Frederick(?) about an hour away. Picturesque little tourist town.
great photo of you and @WarrenWhitlock during www.TwitCastRadio.com show. http://tinyurl.com/5k9cpg I enjoyed it & commented.
I love the hills near Frederick. I believe that Joe Vitale lives near there.
I was on the @JeffHerring affiliate rebate call. The instant rebate was 65% in answer to you question on TSS.
Followed you from the chat on www.TwitCastRadio.com with @WarrenWhitlock
I loved your comment about anywhere else 'following you" would be creepy on www.TwitCastRadio.com w @WarrenWhitlock
I know @ChristinaHills only by her good reputation and your positive comment.You do keep good company, I know @JeffHerring
is interviewing @DaliBurgado today at six about her new product launch on www.BlogTalkRadio.com/AnthonyWhyms
Loved your last Tweet about modeling yourself on @ChristinaHills response. Good idea.
Who are some folks who a guy in the TeleSeminar,Mrkting,Speaking,Product Creation,Internet Marketing circles should follow?
It should be fun to follow your travels in Japan. My wife and I total 10 years in Nihon. Who else is on Twitter in Japan?
I really enjoyed the Entrepreneur Mag Event. UPS store was the sponsor and they did it right. THANKS A BUNCH !
This is an antisocial spamming way to use Twitter. You followed me, but with 1 Tweet to an external site & no name-no way.
I just followed you back. Your joke to end last night-"Two silk worms had a race. They ended up in a tie." is classic. I favorited.
It is always good to follow someone from Long Beach. I will be keeping a watch for your tweets.
You had mentioned Twitter before you left, right? I did notice you leave, but was focused on presenter.
It will teach me to organize a TweetUp at each event I go to. I was only persuaded to attend this last night, so out of loop.
TweetLater http://www.tweetlater.com/ serves as an autoresponders on Twitter. I can also track terms and replies for you.
I suggested to CEO of Entrepreneur Mag-getting BrendonBurchard involved wld help them put on lrg # of Events they will #gth20
Lets talk indeed. Once you follow me I will DM you the phone number.
interview at www.TeleSeminarWebFolk.com Great interview on Mindset Marketing http://snipr.com/7qvzx
Found you from your tweet of TSS.
Found you because you are taking TSS to @FeliciaSlattery. We tweet all the time.
Found you from your tweet about TeleSeminar Secrets.
Your Spectacular Presentation was just that. Thanks for all you do for TeleSeminar Secrets
Thanks for you tweet of 11 for TSS.
Added you because of your TSS post for @JeffHerring.
Thanks for reminding me that the FAQ call for TSS is on now. I dialed in Thanks to you.
and Dan was the Founding Genius for www.TeleSeminarNation.com
Good morning. Someone gave me a cold, perhaps at the Entrepreneur Mag Event in LB. I am actively refusing the gift, but...
You will do fine. I do wish you luck so you will have an excess to pass out to others.
I am still looking for a Responsibility Partner. Who knows someone who might be interested?
did you give me the cold or did I give you the cold. Mine is on the recovery side since I have been stuffed up since Thurs.
You have cardio everytime you fly little birdy. #TSS
@PhilJohncock Please add me to the #TSS list. Great comment on the www.AlexMandossian.com blog tonight.
@chris_swain @ArtistTaraReed @WordPressWizard Looks like all of us are still on the #TSS call. I loved the idea to do cardio.
I am also following you because you commented about #TSS. You might check www.Mashablecom. for information on the hash tag.
My favorite hobby over my life time is bicycling. My wife and I have been riding a tandem togethr for decades.
Thank you for supporting Heirfer Project. We have often given animals or shares and can appreciate the value. Love this idea.
Thank you for the personal invitation: Teleseminar Tues. 9pm EST answering Questions for parents. www.askdrlindasilbert.com
you just posted on the wwiw.AlexMandossian.com blog during Alex's Q and A period. I also commented.
DM me if you would like that idea. I would like to talk.
You make me laugh.
Good morning. Congratulations on you high #TSS Affiliate standings. I am taking it for 1st official time.
Where is next on your extended travel schedule?I am good on Christmas presents, but do some good window shopping,bring a memory
My wife and I have lived in Long Beach since '88 We like it here N of CSULB and 405. Was it CSULB that you attended.
Which class are you taking with @JeffHerring?
@jeffherring deserves praise. I took three major courses from him this year. Great trainer on articles and teleseminars.
Congratulations on reaching 5000 plus followers. You rock!
@Pat_Lorna are shooting for 5000 followers this year so I am just helping the process along a little bit. They are a good folks
@shoemoney @davincidiva @ClaudiaBroome @JonathanGunson @blairwarren @ConsumerQueen @ElaineHanson Do you follow @Pat_Lorna yet?
@jbruin @EndTheRoboCalls @techwatch @IsCool @ClaudiaBroome @TiaSparkles @AskGabe @BDC_Sharon Do you follow @Pat_Lorna yet?
@AprilBraswell @CreditRepairTV @bettydraper @sengseng @derrickcarlisle @Coach_Ferfer Do you follow @Pat_Lorna ? They want 5000-
One more list for you, The Signature Speak and one more for @BobTheTeacher forBTR Internet Marketing http://snipr.com/91or4
Spell check doesn't work on Twitter. You are forgiven. Did you here @FelliciaSlattery on BTR with @BobTheTeacher ? #TSS
Luck I came to listen or it would have been worse. Thanks for the reminder of 11am so I had you tuned in.
Your talk with @BobTheTeach was so good I have told others about it. http://snipr.com/91or4 I even signed to another2lists
I did hear your plug, just as I found that my washing machine had a little water accident. Spent most of the show cleaning
was a lot of fun sharing how to use a signature speech to make money and build your list. http://snipr.com/91or4
RT @SashaKane: Apparently I tweeted the wrong ID for @tkpleslie who is trying to save 5K jobs. I gave her the names of Pro Bloggers, pls ...
Congratulations on 700+ RT @prosperitygal: man I crossed 700 followers today shazam, thanks youguys Ilove that you love me so much woot!
RT @aaswartz: New Blogpost: The Hottest Chapter of My Twitter Affair Yet: TwitCastRadio with Warren Whitlock http://tinyurl.com/5k9cpg
If anyone is looking for TeleSeminar resources try www.TeleSeminarNation.com and www.TeleSeminarWebFolk.com
Excellent show to listen to again RT@larrykevin @WarrenWhitlock and @JimKukral for great info on building your brand, NOW on twitter
RT@JunLoayza got home from the entrepreneur conference in Long Beach. forgot that there were other startups beside internet based ones...
RT @WarrenWhitlock: @EdLovesSumo you didn't miss it.. BTR phone lines failed- doing it TODAY (Wed) at 2pm EST. http://TwitCastRadio.com #TCR
I followed them from this RT @aaswartz @EdLovesSumo Yep, Ed...so sorry we missed you! @rachelpradhan and @searchguru were there today too!
Thanks Ken, I do love to pass on great information. RT @KenMcArthur: @EdLovesSumo is my favorite RT King.
Happy 5th anniversary. Enjoy it. RT @AmeliaBrazell: My husband and I are celebrating our 5th anniversary today.
RT @TeleSeminarNatn: Three more Featured TeleSeminars today. Who wants to learn a little more, network some more, list there own Events.
So True RT @chris_swain @EdLovesSumo @jeffherring has really been spreading his magical elf dust around. How else could he do what he does
RT @drkilstein: My yoga teacher @saravarona is torturing me in yoga bootcamp. Follow her and tell her to ease up on me. I'm begging here...
RT @jameswedmore: @DanSafkow Can we get the whole 1,000 pages of Laws of Success on an MP3 Player, or is that just waay to big?!
RT @AnthonyWhyms: "Internet Marketing Today"...http://snipurl.com/im-today... What will 2009 look like for you? Sat @7:30am PST
You asked what we have in common. We are both marketers with a respect for hypnosis RT @MichaelGlowacki: Welcome @EdLovesSumo
Thank you Thank you RT following, Ed. Teleseminarnation looks like an amazing project!
Thank you Thank you RT @JacquelineStone Hi, Ed. Thanks for following. I love what you guys are doing with Teleseminar Nation.
#TSS Goodnight.
RT @ArtistTaraReed: #TSS - I have found listening to audio while doing cardio keeps me motivated to exercise & puts the info in the head.
Great idea RT @lizmarshall: consider spreading word/donating $10 for GREAT cause that @sarahrobinson put together - http://snipurl.com/7sjcd
I concur that you will learn and have an #IMPACT RT @evajmah: You will learn a lot about marketing by following @KenMcArthur
Most deserved____________________@WarrenWhitlock @jeanettejoy thanks for the nod at http://cli.gs/shorty "best writers of short messages"
c@SarahLindsay You will do just fine on Twitter. Have you noticed how easy it is to follow people? Click on the faces on profile and click.
RT @jenz036: Follow @SarahLindsay--just joined, but once she gets the lingo down, I can guarantee she will add value to your twitter feed :)
Trader Joe's was was busy,but had lots of staff and got us out quickly.Starbucks had lines in both the drive thru and inside.Cheerful folks
Just returned from errands-Honey Baked Ham maxed out parking lot, but had lots of cashiers, Circuit City was empty, but had only 1 cachier.
RT @SpeakingDIVA: @jeffherring I like how you offer a sign on bonus...folks can get what they want specific to their needs/interests. Thanks
RT @letsrock07: Love your enemies. It'll make 'em crazy.
